about_the_game:
In a catastrophic event, the clock is destroyed, time scatters out of control, and the timeline of the homeland falls into chaos. The boundaries between past, present, and future blur. You, as the guardian of time, embark on a challenging journey through levels composed of "time fragments" to repair the shattered clock. Each level is a world filled with puzzles and challenges, where you will face time-based props and mechanisms, unlocking the past and restoring the future within a limited time. To save your homeland, you must piece together time, restart the clock, and restore order.

Key Features

  • Dynamic Countdown Mechanism

    • Real-Time Countdown System: Each level is based on a real-time countdown system, requiring players to complete various challenges and tasks within a limited time.

    • Time Constraints Affect Gameplay: Many challenges are closely tied to the countdown, forcing players to make quick decisions based on the remaining time, adding tension and strategic depth.

  • Minimalist Art Style and Animation Effects

    • Smooth Animations: The game features a unique minimalist art style paired with smooth animations, creating a visual experience of time flowing.

    • Visual Impact: The clean and simple design allows players to focus more on solving puzzles and overcoming challenges.

  • Diverse Prop System

    • Time-Manipulation Props: The game includes various collectible props, such as time pause and time reversal, each with unique functions to help players tackle difficult levels.

    • Strategic Usage: Players must use props wisely according to the level's requirements, adding depth and replayability.

  • Rich Level Design

    • Trial Version Levels: The trial version includes over 30 levels, each with different challenges and puzzles, allowing players to experience diverse time-manipulation gameplay.

    • Full Version Levels: The full version offers over 100 levels, featuring more complex time-based puzzles and challenges, ensuring ample content for players.

  • Custom Level Editor

    • Unlimited Creativity: Players can use the built-in level editor to create their own levels. The editor provides various tools and options, including setting time limits, background colors, props, and other game elements.

    • Creative Workshop: The full version includes a creative workshop where players can share and download custom levels, greatly expanding the game's replayability and community interaction.

  • Achievement System

    • Challenge Yourself: The full version introduces an achievement system, where players can unlock achievements by completing specific tasks or challenges, enhancing the game's replay value.

    • Sense of Accomplishment: The achievement system not only adds goals but also motivates players to push their limits and explore hidden content.

short_description: "Tick Hop" is a time-based puzzle platformer where players control the Guardian of Time. Navigate through levels made of time fragments, solving challenges and unlocking the past to restore the future. Manage a dynamic countdown and use time-altering items to overcome obstacles.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
